dict.acceptation: 商业的；贸易的；营利的；靠广告收入的；

sent.orig: Commercial Clerks and Secretaries is a language-based, commercial knowledge-guided and commercial activities-supplemented course.
sent.trans: 商务文秘》是一门以语言技能为基础，商务知识为主导，商务活动为辅助的实践性操作课程。

sent.orig: A free program must be available for commercial use, commercial development, and commercial distribution.
sent.trans: 一个自由程序应当可以在商业应用、商业开发和商业发布上使用。

sent.orig: At present, the scope of essential services: domestic commercial exhibition, conference,shops, showrooms, commercial activities.
sent.trans: 目前主要服务范围：国内商业展览展示、会议、巡展、专卖店、展厅、商业活动。

sent.orig: International commercial arbitration (ICA) plays a big role in solving international commercial dispute.
sent.trans: 国际商事仲裁在解决国际经济贸易纠纷中发挥着不可代替的作用。

sent.orig: Provide all kinds of loans to agricultural, industrial, and commercial enterprises, private industrial and commercial households.
sent.trans: 办理农工商企业、个体工商户及居民个人贷款。
